tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Crowns,Dental Cleaning,Dental X-Ray,
review: Dr. Lakshmi is an highly experienced Prosthodontist and Implantologist. Perfect Diagnosis, Friendly and most compassionate care made me more comfortable with the treatment. Dr. V. Gopi Krishna internationally repute Endodontist, Clinician and Academician - is master in performing Root Canal explained the Dental Health Issue in a simple and more understandable way. Dr. V. Gopi Krishna and Dr. Lakshmi truly - "Dental Specialists in Saving Teeth" - which is the perfect one liner of the Root Canal Foundation. I would not only hesitate to recommend Root Canal Foundation but also to take advantage of these high professional and ethical Doctors in solving the teeth issues. Not to forget the warm reception provided by receptionist and Junior Doctors - Whole Team is fully committed in serving the society.
